scope.title: AgDS Beta v1.26.0 release
scope.description: Adds two new replacement Date picker components, a Toggle button component, 18 new icons, wide-screen layout improvements, TypeScript support for many native HTML attributes, updated release of the yourgov app, plus various bug fixes and improvements.
